part.Name: Description
part.Short: =pronouns.Possessive= unkempt hair juts out in all directions, giving them an endearing, almost comical appearance. With every movement, =pronouns.subjective= emit an enthusiastic chatter, their voice rising above the din of the cavern. =pronouns.Subjective= seem oblivious to danger, =pronouns.objective= unwavering devotion to their 'champion' evident in every word and gesture.
